table.name: vtiger_serviceengineer
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_serviceengineer` ( `serviceengineerid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `service_engineer_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`serviceengineerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_serviceengineercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_serviceengineercf` ( `serviceengineerid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`serviceengineerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
